Text.Page:
The {@LinkCreature:41#4001#ravenous basilisks} in northern Feral Valley grow bolder with each passing day. Their attacks cost us lives we can't afford to spare.

I want you to hunt them down and deliver proof of their deaths to Jeulile at Feral Valley Station.
Seems your reputation's a well-deserved one. Here's your reward from the federationâ€”you've earned it.
{@LinkCreature:41#4001#Ravenous basilisks} are a threat to everyone. The federation will pay well for their deaths.
